name: Laura Sanità
content: Laura Sanità Home Bio Activities Publications Students Laura Sanità Full Professor Department of Computing Sciences Bocconi University Via Roentgen, 1 (2nd floor, Room 2-C1-08) 20136 Milano, Italy Research Interests: Combinatorial Optimization, Approximation Algorithms, Network Design, Algorithmic Game Theory, Operations Research Contact: laura.sanita AT unibocconi.it Short Bio July 2003: Bachelor's degree in Management Engineering, from "Università di Roma Tor Vergata", Italy. October 2005: Master's degree in Management Engineering, from "Università di Roma Tor Vergata", Italy. January 2009: Doctoral degree in Operations Research, from "Università Sapienza di Roma", Rome, Italy. February 2009 — August 2011: PostDoc at Discrete Optimization Group, EPFL, Lausanne, Switzerland. September 2011 — December 2011: World Trip (here is my route!) January 2012 — June 2017: Assistant Professor at C&O, University of Waterloo, Canada. July 2017 — August 2025: Associate Professor (@UWaterloo, Canada (until 2020), @TU Eindhoven, Netherlands (until 2022), @Bocconi, Italy (until 2025)) ...since September 2025: Full Professor at Bocconi University, Italy. Activities Institutional work: I am the program director of the Bocconi Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence, and the CS curriculum coordinator of the PhD Program in Statistics and Computer Science Member of the evaluation committee for the SNSF Ambizione program in theoretical computer science, Switzerland, (since 2024) Member of the selection committee for the “Trevisan Prize” (2025) Member of the selection committee for the “Tucker Prize” (2021-2024) Program Committees: ICALP 2025, IPCO 2025, SODA 2025, ESA 2024, SWAT 2024, STOC 2023, ISAAC 2023, WG 2023, SOSA 2023, IPCO 2022 (Local chair), APPROX 2021 (PC Chair), MFCS 2021, WADS 2021, CanaDAM 2021, CSR 2021, ESA 2020, APPROX 2020, WAOA 2020, SODA 2020, SODA 2019, FUN 2018, ISAAC 2017, APPROX 2017, SPAA 2017, IPCO 2017, WAOA 2015 (PC Co-chair), WAOA 2014, ESA 2014. Editorship: Associate Editor of the journals "Mathematical Programming", "Mathematics of Operations Research" and "Operations Research Letters". Research awards: Recipient of a NWO-VIDI award, from the Dutch Research Council, Netherlands. Recipient of a 2019 Discovery Accelerator Supplements Award, from the Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada (NSERC). Recipient of a UWaterloo Faculty of Mathematics Golden Jubilee Research Excellence Award. Recipient of 2015 Early Researcher Award administered by the Province of Ontario. Co-recipient of the Best Paper Award at the conference STOC 2010. Recent Events: Co-organizer of the series of “Aussois Workshop in combinatorial optimization" since 2024 Co-organizer of the series of “Cargese Workshop in combinatorial optimization” since 2021 Co-organizer of the series Bocconi Theory Day 2023, 2024, 2025 Co-organizer of the ICERM Semester Research Program in “Discrete Optimization”, Spring 2023 Co-organizer of the Hausdorff Trimester Research Program in “Discrete Optimization”, Fall 2021 Co-organizer of the Oberwolfach meeting “Combinatorial Optimization”, 2024 Co-organizer of the Dagstuhl Seminar “Graph Algorithms: Cuts, Flows, and Network Design”, 2023 Selected Publications Note: Colours distinguish Journals, Conference Proceedings, or Others.
